ftb.client
Class FTB_Event_Property

java.lang.Object
  ftb.client.FTB_Event_Property

public class FTB_Event_Property
extends java.lang.Object

Used to send payload data with an event. It consists of

  • event type
  • event payload

RESPONSE

Constructor Detail

FTB_Event_Property

public FTB_Event_Property(byte event_type)
Constructs an event property. An event property includes
  • event type
  • event payload

Parameters:
event_type - type of the event to send. event_type is one of the following two,
  • INFO
  • RESPONSE

set_payload

public int set_payload(java.lang.String message)
Assigns a message of string as the content of event payload.

Parameters:
message - message content string.
Returns:
status code as defined in FTB_DEF.
